test_cases.test_name: Verification of Custom API Integration with Wearable Devices
test_cases.objective: To verify that the custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices are functioning as expected.
prerequisites: Wearable device connected to the system

test_steps.action: Send a test data packet from the wearable device to the CTMS via the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data packet is received and processed by the CTMS without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Data packet is accurately received and processed by the CTMS.
No errors are logged during the data exchange.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission and processing.

test_cases.test_name: Validation of Custom Dashboards with Advanced Visualizations
test_cases.objective: To validate that the custom dashboards with advanced visualizations are displaying data correctly and updating in real-time.
prerequisites: Sample data loaded into the system

test_steps.action: Access the custom dashboard and verify the initial data display.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard displays the correct initial data set.

test_steps.action: Update the sample data and observe the dashboard for real-time updates.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard updates within 5 minutes of data changes.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays the correct initial data set.
Dashboard updates within 5 minutes of data changes.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during display and updates.

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Real-Time Wearable Data Exchange
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices as specified in URS-CTMS-005.
prerequisites: CTMS system is installed and operational

test_steps.action: Configure the wearable device simulator to send test data to the CTMS via the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data is successfully transmitted to the CTMS system.

test_steps.action: Verify the received data is correctly processed and stored in the CTMS database.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is accurately stored and accessible within the CTMS.
data_to_capture: Database record of the transmitted data

acceptance_criteria: Data transmission is completed within 5 seconds
All data fields are correctly mapped and stored
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be encrypted during transmission
Data must be immutable once stored

test_cases.test_name: Custom Adaptive Trial Design Module Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality of the custom adaptive trial design module as specified in URS-CTMS-003.
prerequisites: CTMS system is installed and operational
Test adaptive trial protocol is loaded
User with appropriate permissions is available

test_steps.action: Load the test adaptive trial protocol into the CTMS system.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully loaded and visible in the system.

test_steps.action: Simulate patient enrollment and verify the adaptive algorithm adjusts the trial parameters correctly.
test_steps.expected_result: Trial parameters are adjusted according to the predefined adaptive algorithm.

acceptance_criteria: Algorithm adjustments are completed within 10 minutes
All adjustments comply with the trial protocol
data_integrity_requirements: All adjustments must be logged with timestamp and user ID
Original parameters must be preserved in audit trail

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Real-Time Wearable Data Exchange
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom API for real-time data exchange with wearable devices functions as intended and maintains data integrity.
prerequisites: Veeva CTMS platform installed and configured
Wearable device simulator or actual device available

test_steps.action: Configure the wearable device simulator to send test data to the CTMS API endpoint.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted to the CTMS API endpoint without errors.
data_to_capture: Data payload received by the API

test_steps.action: Verify the received data is correctly stored in the CTMS database and displayed in the relevant dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is accurately stored and displayed in real-time within the CTMS dashboard.
data_to_capture: Database record of the transmitted data

acceptance_criteria: Data from wearable devices is received and stored without loss or corruption.
Dashboard updates reflect the new data within 5 minutes of receipt.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be encrypted during transmission and at rest.
Audit trail must record all data transactions.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Adaptive Trial Design Module Functionality Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality of the custom adaptive trial design module to ensure it correctly implements proprietary algorithms.
prerequisites: Custom adaptive trial design module installed
Test trial protocol with adaptive design parameters loaded

test_steps.action: Load a test trial protocol with predefined adaptive design parameters into the CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully loaded and adaptive parameters are recognized by the system.

test_steps.action: Simulate patient enrollment and trigger adaptive design adjustments based on the protocol rules.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly applies adaptive design adjustments and updates trial parameters as expected.

acceptance_criteria: Adaptive design adjustments are triggered and applied according to the protocol rules.
All adjustments are logged in the audit trail with timestamps and user context.
data_integrity_requirements: All adaptive adjustments must be traceable and auditable.
Protocol rules must be enforced without deviation.

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality and reliability of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices and AI-based image analysis systems.

test_steps.action: Initiate data transfer from wearable devices to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully received and processed by CTMS.

test_steps.action: Send image analysis results from AI system to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Image analysis results are accurately integrated into CTMS.

acceptance_criteria: All data transfers complete within 5 minutes
Data integrity maintained throughout the process
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data encryption during transfer
Verify data completeness

test_cases.test_name: Custom Dashboard Functionality Check
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations in the CTMS.

test_steps.action: Access the custom dashboard for patient enrollment tracking.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard displays accurate and up-to-date enrollment data.

test_steps.action: Generate a complex trial report using the custom dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated within 30 minutes and contains accurate data.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard updates within 5 minutes of data changes
Reports generate within 30 minutes
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data consistency across visualizations
Verify report accuracy

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration with Wearable Devices
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom API integration with wearable devices for real-time data exchange.

test_steps.action: Configure the custom API endpoint in the Veeva CTMS platform.
test_steps.expected_result: API endpoint is successfully configured and accessible.

test_steps.action: Send test data from a wearable device to the CTMS via the API.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data is received and processed by the CTMS without errors.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is displayed correctly in the CTMS dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Data from the wearable device is accurately reflected in the dashboard.

acceptance_criteria: API integration is functional
Data is accurately processed and displayed
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission
Maintain audit trail for data exchange

test_cases.test_name: Custom Encryption for Data Sovereignty Compliance
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom encryption implementation for data sovereignty compliance in specific jurisdictions.

test_steps.action: Configure the custom encryption settings in the CTMS for a specific jurisdiction.
test_steps.expected_result: Encryption settings are successfully applied and active.

test_steps.action: Encrypt test data using the custom encryption module.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data is encrypted according to the specified standards.

test_steps.action: Verify the encrypted data can be decrypted and accessed by authorized users.
test_steps.expected_result: Encrypted data is successfully decrypted and accessible to authorized users.

acceptance_criteria: Custom encryption is functional
Data is securely encrypted and accessible
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during encryption
Maintain audit trail for encryption processes

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Real-Time Wearable Data Exchange
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom API functionality for real-time data exchange with wearable devices meets the specified requirements.
prerequisites: CTMS system is installed and operational

test_steps.action: Configure the wearable device simulator to send test data to the CTMS API endpoint.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data is successfully transmitted to the CTMS system.

test_steps.action: Verify the CTMS system processes and stores the received wearable data correctly.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is stored in the CTMS database and is accessible via the patient enrollment tracking module.
data_to_capture: Database record of the transmitted data
Accessibility of data in the patient enrollment tracking module

acceptance_criteria: API successfully receives and processes wearable device data in real-time.
Data integrity is maintained throughout the transmission and storage process.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be encrypted during transmission and storage.
Audit trail must record all data transactions.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Dashboard Visualization Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that the custom dashboards with advanced visualizations display data accurately and update in real-time.
prerequisites: CTMS system is installed and operational
Test data is loaded into the system

test_steps.action: Access the custom dashboard module and select a predefined visualization.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard loads without errors and displays the selected visualization.

test_steps.action: Update the test data in the CTMS system and verify the dashboard updates accordingly.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard reflects the updated data within the specified 5-minute timeframe.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboards load and display data accurately.
Dashboards update within 5 minutes of data changes.
data_integrity_requirements: Visualizations must accurately represent the underlying data.
Dashboard updates must not corrupt or alter the source data.

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration with Wearable Devices
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom API integration with wearable devices for real-time data exchange.

test_steps.action: Configure the custom API settings in the CTMS platform.
test_steps.expected_result: API settings are successfully configured.

test_steps.action: Send test data from a wearable device to the CTMS platform.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data is received and processed by the CTMS platform.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is displayed correctly in the CTMS dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is accurately displayed in the CTMS dashboard.

acceptance_criteria: Data is successfully exchanged between wearable devices and CTMS
Data is accurately displayed in the dashboard
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission
Maintain audit trail for data exchange

test_cases.test_name: Custom Encryption for Data Sovereignty Compliance
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom encryption implementation for data sovereignty compliance in specific jurisdictions.

test_steps.action: Enable custom encryption for a specific jurisdiction in the CTMS platform.
test_steps.expected_result: Custom encryption is successfully enabled.

test_steps.action: Transmit test data through the encrypted channel.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is transmitted securely through the encrypted channel.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is decrypted correctly at the destination.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is accurately decrypted and accessible.

acceptance_criteria: Data is securely encrypted during transmission
Data is accurately decrypted at the destination
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during encryption and decryption
Maintain audit trail for encryption processes

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality and reliability of custom APIs developed for real-time data exchange with wearable devices and AI-based image analysis systems.

test_steps.action: Send test data from wearable device simulator to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is received and processed correctly by CTMS.

test_steps.action: Send test images from AI-based image analysis system to CTMS via custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Images are received and processed correctly by CTMS.

acceptance_criteria: All test data is processed correctly
API response times are within acceptable limits
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission
Verify data accuracy post-processing

test_cases.test_name: Custom Dashboard Functionality Check
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality and accuracy of custom dashboards with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Load sample data into the CTMS and navigate to the custom dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard displays data correctly with advanced visualizations.

test_steps.action: Update sample data and refresh the dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard updates within 5 minutes with new data.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays data accurately
Dashboard updates within specified time
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during display
Verify data accuracy in visualizations

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Real-Time Wearable Data Exchange
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices as specified in URS-CTMS-005.
prerequisites: Wearable device simulator or actual device connected

test_steps.action: Configure the wearable device simulator to send test data to the CTMS via the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted to the CTMS without errors.

test_steps.action: Verify the received data in the CTMS dashboard and ensure it matches the sent data.
test_steps.expected_result: Data displayed in the dashboard matches the data sent by the wearable device.

acceptance_criteria: API successfully receives and processes data from wearable devices.
Data is accurately displayed in the CTMS dashboard within the specified 5-minute update window.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission and storage.
Maintain audit trail for all data exchanges.

test_cases.test_name: Regulatory Inspection Readiness Package Generation Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the system's ability to automatically generate regulatory inspection readiness packages as per URS-CTMS-018.
prerequisites: CTMS system with sample clinical trial data loaded

test_steps.action: Initiate the generation of a regulatory inspection readiness package from the CTMS interface.
test_steps.expected_result: System processes the request and begins package generation without errors.

test_steps.action: Verify the contents of the generated package for completeness and accuracy.
test_steps.expected_result: Package includes all required documents and data as specified in regulatory requirements.

acceptance_criteria: System successfully generates a complete regulatory inspection readiness package.
Package includes all necessary audit trails, documents, and data as per regulatory requirements.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data in the package is accurate and unaltered.
Maintain integrity of audit trails and electronic signatures.

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Wearable Devices
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality and reliability of custom APIs for real-time data exchange with wearable devices.
prerequisites: CTMS system is installed and configured
Wearable device test data is available

test_steps.action: Configure the CTMS to connect to the wearable device API endpoint.
test_steps.expected_result: Connection is established successfully with no errors.

test_steps.action: Send test data from the wearable device to the CTMS via the API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is received and stored in the CTMS without corruption.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is displayed correctly in the CTMS dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is accurately reflected in the dashboard within 5 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: API connection is stable and error-free
Data integrity is maintained during transmission
Dashboard updates within the specified time frame
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be encrypted during transmission
No data loss or corruption is acceptable

test_cases.test_name: Regulatory Inspection Readiness Package Generation
test_cases.objective: Validate the system's ability to automatically generate regulatory inspection readiness packages.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the regulatory inspection module in the CTMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Module is accessible and functional.

test_steps.action: Select a clinical trial and request an inspection readiness package.
test_steps.expected_result: System processes the request without errors.

test_steps.action: Verify the generated package contains all required documents and data.
test_steps.expected_result: Package is complete and includes all regulatory-required elements.

acceptance_criteria: Inspection package is generated within 30 minutes
All required documents are included
No errors occur during generation
data_integrity_requirements: All data must be accurate and complete
No documents should be missing from the package
